title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5012.1 - Establishment of accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5012.1 - Establishment of accounts

State Regulations

When a benefit payable by the system accrues to a person who
is under a legal disability, and no legal representative is duly appointed
within six months of the date the benefit accrued, a savings account in the
name of the beneficiary shall be established effective as of the date such
six-month period lapsed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5012.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
